Intro¶

blue leaf is a SASS and JavaScript/jQuery library to design websites. It provides basic mixins to define the website’s layout and behaviour. All features are responsive and respond instantly to new screen sizes. Also, blue leaf does not want to preset any styles when it comes to colors, margins, typography and so on. If you feel that there is something not as universal as it could be, please create an issue.

One striking feature is that SASS mixins can define behaviour that is not possible with CSS, such as sticky elements or trigger. The blue leaf’s core script parses JavaScript comments for JSON data and applys the features on the given selectors. See Custom Rules for more information.
